faq_1_q: How does API-based cert management work?
faq_1_a: Use our REST API to add domains, trigger issuance, and monitor status programmatically. Perfect for CI/CD pipelines and infrastructure-as-code.
faq_2_q: What authentication methods do you support?
faq_2_a: API tokens (scoped, revocable) and OAuth2. All tokens are hashed with SHA-256 before storage.
faq_3_q: Can I use this in Kubernetes or Docker?
faq_3_a: Yes! Deploy our cert-manager integration or use the API directly from your orchestration layer. Examples available in our GitHub repo.
faq_4_a: Free tier: 10 requests/minute. Pro: 100/minute. Enterprise: custom limits. Rate limit headers included in all responses.
faq_5_q: Is there a webhook system for cert lifecycle events?
faq_5_a: Yes. Configure webhooks to receive real-time notifications for issuance, renewal, and error events. Supports HMAC signature verification.
